summary: Featuring never-before-seen footage, this documentary delivers a startling new look at the Peoples Temple, headed by preacher Jim Jones who, in 1978, led more than 900 members to Guyana, where he orchestrated a mass suicide via tainted punch.
cast: Rebecca Moore|Janet Shular|Tim Carter|Stanley Clayton|Hue Fortson Jr.|Garrett Lambrev|Claire Janaro|Neva Sly Hargrave|Deborah Layton|Phyllis Wilmore Zimmerman|Chuck Wilmore|John R. Hall|Tim Reiterman|June Cordell|Eugene Cordell|Garnett Day|Fielding McGehee|Joyce Shaw-Houston|Bryan Kravitz|Juanell Smart|Mike Touchette|Laura Johnston Kohl|Kristine Kravitz|Grace Stoen|Marshall Kilduff|Vernon Gosney|Jordan Vilchez|Eugene Smith|Jackie Speier|Stephen Sung|Willie Brown|Gary Green|Jim Jones|Leo J. Ryan|Fidel Castro
title: Jonestown: The Life and Death of Peoples Temple
